item.title: A Simple Hamiltonian Chain Monte Carlo Example with TensorFlow Probability
item.description: In this post we want to revisit a simple bayesian inference example worked out in this blog post. This time we want to use TensorFlow Probability (TFP) instead of PyMC3. References: Statistical Rethinking is an amazing reference for Bayesian analysis. It also has a sequence of online lectures freely available on YouTube. An introduction to probabilistic programming, now available in TensorFlow Probability There are many examples on the TensorFlowâ€™s GitHub repository.
